item.title: Finding nth salaries
item.description: We are asked to find specific salary.salaries values within our employees database. USE `employees`; Letâ€™s find who has the highest salaries in our database. SELECT * FROM `salaries` ORDER BY `salaries`.`salary` DESC LIMIT 0, 5; Table 1: 5 records emp_no salary from_date to_date 43624 158220 2002-03-22 9999-01-01 43624 157821 2001-03-22 2002-03-22 254466 156286 2001-08-04 9999-01-01 47978 155709 2002-07-14 9999-01-01 253939 155513 2002-04-11 9999-01-01 We notice in our query above we have multiple salaries per employee (see emp_no 43624).
